message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150. Is this a price you'd be interested in?
I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $110 for it. Can you consider this price?
I understand that $150 is a bit steep for you, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle. I can offer it to you for $135. Is that a price you'd be comfortable with?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $125 for the product. Can you consider this price?
I'm getting closer to your price, but I'm not quite there yet. I can offer it to you for $130. It's my final offer, but I think it's a great deal for you!
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $125 for the product. I'm not sure I can go any lower than this. Can you meet me at this price?
I understand that you're not willing to go any lower, but I'm not willing to sell it to you for $125 either. I'm willing to meet you at $128. That's the lowest I can go.
